Paint

Class PrimaryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Paint.PrimaryController

  • public class PrimaryController
extends java.lang.Object
    The main fxml controller handles user inputs nd the choosing of buttons

      • CloseAll

        public int CloseAll(boolean newCloseMain)
        prompts the close for all the tabes
        Parameters:
        newCloseMain - the start of a close
        Returns:
        result is 0 if the user has not chosen, 1 if error, 2 is Save, 3 if do not Save, 4 if cancel launches the prompt to ask if the file should be saved called by the main function on close
